parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.74

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Tree View

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets scalar data to item on given path. IDC means id of parent Tree View. If the given value is not integer, it will be converted to integer

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[tvSetValue]] [idc, path, val]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> path: [[Array]] of [[Number]]s

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> val: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name> s2</name>=<value> ctrl [[tvSetValue]] [path, val]

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> ctrl: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> path: [[Array]] of [[Number]]s

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> val: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[tvSetValue]] [101, [0], 555];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_ctrl [[tvSetValue]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[0,0,0], 14];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[tvAdd]], [[tvClear]], [[tvCollapse]], [[tvCount]], [[tvCurSel]], [[tvData]], [[tvDelete]], [[tvExpand]], [[tvPicture]], [[tvSetCurSel]], [[tvSetData]], [[tvSetPicture]], [[tvSort]], [[tvSortByValue]], [[tvText]], [[tvValue]]
</value></part></template>
